original_text: When the camp is ready to move, the men from Kohath's clan must be ready to carry all those things. But they must wait until Aaron and his sons have covered God's Holy Tent and all its holy things. The men from Kohath's clan must not touch the holy things. They will die if they touch the holy things. These are the jobs of Kohath's clan. They must carry the things from the Tent of Meeting when the Israelites travel.
korean_text: 진영을 떠날 때에 아론과 그의 아들들이 성소와 성소의 모든 기구 덮는 일을 마치거든 고핫 자손들이 와서 멜 것이니라 그러나 성물은 만지지 말라 그들이 죽으리라 회막 물건 중에서 이것들은 고핫 자손이 멜 것이며

sentences.original_text: When the camp is ready to move
the men from Kohath's clan must be ready
until Aaron and his sons have covered
God's Holy Tent and all its holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 성막과 그 모든 거룩한 것들을

sentences.original_text: The men from Kohath's clan must not touch
sentences.korean_translation: 고핫 족속의 남자들은 만지면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: if they touch the holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그 거룩한 것들을 만진다면

sentences.original_text: These are the jobs of Kohath's clan
